tool_description: Extracts and ranks relevant keywords and phrases from academic texts for indexing and categorization purposes.

text_content.description: Text content to extract keywords from

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract (5-50)

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for keyword extraction.
Invalid keyword limit: max_keywords must be between 5 and 50.
Text too short: Content must be at least 50 characters for keyword extraction.
Extraction failed: Unable to identify meaningful keywords from the provided text.
usage: Provide text_content for analysis. Optionally set max_keywords (5-50) and include_phrases to control extraction scope.

total_extracted.description: Total number of keywords and phrases extracted
